title: Apple provides $25 million to CNote investment platform to support communities of color
content:
CNote is a women-led impact investment platform using technology to invest in diverse communities. Announced today, Apple is using the CNote platform to give back $25 million to underserved communities across the US. This is one of multiple efforts from the tech giant in tackling racial inequality throughout the country.

more…

The post Apple provides $25 million to CNote investment platform to support communities of color appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is using the CNote platform to give back $25 million to underserved communities across the United States.
